name: Ext_R4B_CapabilityStatement_fhirVersion
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CapabilityStatement|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The version of the FHIR specification that this CapabilityStatement describes (which SHALL be the same as the FHIR version of the CapabilityStatement itself). There is no default value.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion` maps to R4 `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The version of the FHIR specification that this CapabilityStatement describes (which SHALL be the same as the FHIR version of the CapabilityStatement itself). There is no default value.
element.comment: `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion` maps to R4 `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
